String name()

      • parentId

        @Nullable
@CheckReturnValue
default String parentId()
        Returns:
        The id of the Category that is the parent of this channel. May be null.

      • parentIdAsLong

        @CheckReturnValue
long parentIdAsLong()
        Returns:
        The id of the Category that is the parent of this channel. A value of 0 means no parent.

      • overrides

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
List<PermissionOverride> overrides()
        Returns:
        The permission overrides set on this channel. Will never be null, but may be empty.
